params.name: text
params.description: Text to use within the breadcrumbs item.

params.name: title
params.description: Optional title for the breadcrumb item used in the title attribute.

name: noCollapse
description: When true, the breadcrumbs will not collapse to the first and last item only on smaller devices.

name: labelText
description: A custom value to use as the `aria-label`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the breadcrumbs.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the breadcrumbs.
